title: Most popular crisps and savoury snack brands in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2013
summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Snack Brand, and Share of respondents currently purchasing in each Snack Brand on the y axis.
Snack Brand Walkers has the highest Share of respondents currently purchasing and KP nuts has the lowest Share of respondents currently purchasing.
The minimum Snack Brand KP nuts has got 1.91 times less Share of respondents currently purchasing than the maximum Snack Brand Walkers.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Snack Brand in the x axis and Share of respondents currently purchasing in the y axis.
The Share of respondents currently purchasing is appeared to be the highest at Snack Brand Walkers and lowest at Snack Brand KP nuts.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Snack Brand, and Share of respondents currently purchasing in each Snack Brand on the y axis.
Snack Brand Walkers has the highest Share of respondents currently purchasing and KP nuts has the lowest Share of respondents currently purchasing.
The minimum Snack Brand KP nuts has got 1.91 times less Share of respondents currently purchasing than the maximum Snack Brand Walkers.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents currently purchasing for 7 number of Snack Brands.
The Share of respondents currently purchasing is highest at Snack Brand Walkers and lowest at Snack Brand KP nuts.
Snack Brand Doritos has the second highest value for Share of respondents currently purchasing.
The highest Snack Brand Walkers has 20.0 more Share of respondents currently purchasing than the lowest Snack Brand KP nuts.
Share of respondents currently purchasing at Snack Brand Walkers is 42.0 , second place is Doritos at 32.0, and thirdly is Pringles at 26.0.
Snack Brand Hula Hoops, and Pringles share the same value 26.0.
The highest value 42.0 at Walkers is almost 1.49 times larger than the average value 28.14.
